column5: Anywhere to buy leeches by the pound around Hamilton?  By the dozen is too expensive for a week fishing trip!  Thanks!! Burt
Try one of the Asian markets on or around York Boulevard in Hamilton. I'm not kidding.
Try one of the Asian markets on or around York Boulevard in Hamilton, I kid you not. Bring a picture of a leach, there are language barriers when I shop for things at these markets often.  OOps.
You are only allowed 120 in your possession at anyone time,a pound would be over that.
hmmm, what if you could split them between a few friends though?
Exactly...... seems to be common to buy them this way on-line in the USA, but can't find anything in Canada.  Burt
There is a place in Havelock that will sell them by the pound,no where near Hamilton though.
I went to Marion's in Havelock last year and they did not sell by the pound, cool little shop though.
